The fabric is nice and gives a little so that it doesn’t feel too tight. It comes in beautiful colors and is affordable so I’ll definitely order a couple more to wear in the Summer. Great to wear out to lunch or a daytime event.

I bought two of these jumpsuits, the material is Silky and fits well. I love the stretchy top so that I don't have to wear a bra. I'm 5 ft 5 inches and 240 lb and the XXL was a perfect fit. The leg length was fine for me because I love to wear flats.

The only problem I had was- I’m 5’1, so this jumper was long! It was definitely made for taller people. There was no time to get it hemmed, so I just used no-sew iron on adhesives.

评论概述: Didn’t work for my body type
评论详情: Since I was planning on carry everything in a backpack, and walking city to city while in Spain, I looking for a lightweight jumpsuit to change into for evening activities. With jumpsuits, I usually opt for XL or XXL because I have thick thighs and a big booty. These fit well on my lower half, but hung on my upper torso (38D) and didn’t even touch my waist. Any smaller of a size, and would have been high waters or camel toe city (I’m only 5’8”). Likely made for people with more proportionate bust/waist/hip measurements - where waist and bust are closer in measurements.

I got this to be able to just jump into something on hectic mornings- and it went above expectations- it keeps its shape and size with washing and drying- it’s a thinner material yet- comfortable- my pattern is not see through- it’s very flowy too- gives an air of whimsy- I love it-
This is definitely a great go to summer outfit. It’s comfortable and has pockets
I’m 5’7 ordered large way too short.  Wish it was longer, super cute!
Honestly super cute and comfortable. They stretch really well and the pockets are awesome. I’ve gotten a lot of compliments! I am 5’4” and weight ~175. These are a large.

This romper is so cute, I love the cute flower print! It is actually really comfortable too, I could have worn it all day! The only thing is I could see how the material in the chest area and straps might get a little uncomfortable after awhile, but I haven't worn it long enough to test that yet. I saw some of the comments saying that the straps were too short, but I don't think that will be an issue for me, as I have small shoulders and am only a bra size 32B. For reference, I am 5'3, 127-130 lbs, with wide hips and I ordered a small.
The romper is so comfortable, and it fit perfect. I was afraid that it would not fit well. The material is nice too.

I love the outfit and the fabric feels fantastic. I was really excited about this outfit. I wore it for the first time a couple of days ago and then washed it. I did not put it in the dryer and hung it to dry.  I put it on yesterday and the pants now look like Capri pants. My window has passed by two days and I’m hoping the seller will help me and replace it. I will keep you posted.

I received a lot of compliments on this jumper. It it’s true to size and the material is thin but in a good way.  Perfect for summer days. I washed it and it didn’t shrink. The color is true to the photo.
I received this and wore it the same day, receiving many compliments at the event I was attending!

评论概述: Super cute and comfy - midsize woman
评论详情: This jumpsuit is super cute and comfy. For reference - 5’5”, around 175, 36D-38C bra size, largest in my belly area and I got the Large in the gold/mustard yellow bandanna/paisley print. It was a perfect fit and flattering for my body type I felt. I’m self conscious about my flabby arms and it was fall so I paired it with a denim shirt/jacket, it could be worn with sandal wedges, booties, or heels for someone my height as it went past my ankles. FYI and planning undergarments, ironing, etc. it is the super thin, lightweight, and prone to wrinkling material, the straps are wide but not adjustable and seemed like they may be short for some body types. Straight out of the package I hung it up and used Downy wrinkle release, didn’t iron, and it was just a little wrinkly.

I got so many compliments on this jumper. When I first opened it, it was very short. But once ironed the length was fine. Long enough to wear with short heels or flats. Did drag a little in flats. I'm 5'-1" and 115lbs. I ordered a small. The straps don't stretch a lot so I wore them off shoulder so it didn't bunch under my armpits. Very light fabric and breathable.

Amazon thought I might like this - they were right! The scrunchies at the top adds a nice texture and fit before the loose bottom. I'm tall but the length wasn't awkward. I add a belt to finish the look as I find without one it's missing something for me, but otherwise great!  The fabric is light enough, the color is soooo great, and I've worn it on a girls night out and also to a bridal shower, dress up or dress it down, super flexible and versatile.  Only drawback as with any romper, the functionality of going to the bathroom, etc. But you know that going into it sooo if that's a problem, don't buy rompers.
I am short and fluffy, but this romper is so flattering and actually made me look taller. Great material and so comfortable. Definitely add this to your wardrobe.
This is such a cute jumper. Good quality material. I am 5’8” and the pants are plenty long.
Love the material, great for summer, very flattering. The straps did keep falling off but I can fix that was easy tailoring.

The cutest cheap outfit ever.  Received so many compliments on this little jumper.

Highly recommend!  Fits great. Good length. Flowy fabric. I get tons of compliments

I thought it was suppose to have adjustable straps but mine didn't. That wouldn't be hard to shorten it a little if need be. I washed and dried mine and I didn't notice any shrinkage. If I hadn't read many reviews before making my decision, it would have been huge based on their size guide. I might have for a small but I wanted it to come down on to of my feet and figured I could always hem it up verses adding material.

I loved the print on this outfit so I had to purchase it. The length was good (I’m a shorter girl so I was thrilled about that part). My major complaint would have to be the stride in this outfit. It seems short and makes it uncomfortable. I do like the style though.

The best jumpsuit ever! So comfortable! Nice material. Beautiful print! Got some many compliments when I wore it. Buy it. You will not regret it! Looks so great.
